markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tail Snatch](/Feats.aspx?ID=4010) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 56</row>

</column>

---

You can whip your tail around to lash items from the unwary's grip. You attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) a creature, ignoring the requirement that you must have at least one hand free. As normal, your tail can't hold the items it disarms.
name: Tail Snatch
